channel.title: CVE Feed for Trend Micro -- Trend Micro Maximum Security

item.title: CVE-2022-30687|2024-08-03T06:56:13.447Z -- trend%20micro -- trend%20micro%20maximum%20security
item.description: Trend Micro Maximum Security 2022 is vulnerable to a link following vulnerability that could allow a low privileged local user to manipulate the product's secure erase feature to delete arbitrary files.
